title: New update

title: Really good app but some problems
text: Okay so first off I love this app a lot I have it on my iPad and I can just click on music a listen to it but now there‚Äôs this shuffle thing that ruins it a bit cause I just want to click on music and listen to it but I can‚Äôt cause it‚Äôs shuffle so it makes me stressed and mad cause I just want to listen to music normally but I can‚Äôt and then if I skip some songs I have to wait like a while hour to give me more which makes me mad but. Over all it is a good app just please fix these problem cause it is annoying I understand you can put some good things in premium but you can‚Äôt not put music normally in premium and shuffle it on free like let a person listen to their music and they need to bring back liked songs cause I‚Äôm tired of playlists but like I said overall it‚Äôs a good app but please fix this cause it‚Äôs getting bad and I‚Äôm thinking of going into Apple Music so just please fix this and thank you, bye

title: Don't get this if you don't have Premium
text:
It's awful. You can barely edit your own playlists, you can't even listen to short clips of songs, you can't open albums, you can't open other people's playlists to see what's in there, and now I can't even see all of MY OWN PUBLIC PLAYLISTS.  There's 5 ads every 3 songs, and the audio quality can get.... questionable. The biggest, most glaring problem with everything here is that they used to be functional. You used to be able to easily edit playlists, you could listen to clips of songs to get an idea of what they're like, you could look through other playlists and open albums, heck you used to even be able to get a pop-up offering 30 minutes of ad-free listening. But now it's just an unusable, barely-functioning app all so they can shove Premium in your face. Also, no, I'm not getting Premium. I literally can't. 

I'm deleting this app after leaving this review, despite the fact that it used to be my main way of listening to music on my phone. There are better ones out there.

title: Mostly good
text: It‚Äôs nice to have an app you can listen to music on whenever you want. I have 2 problems with this, the first one is that when you get an ad after it, it says ‚Äúenjoy the next 30 minutes of uninterrupted listening‚Äù say I‚Äôm listening to my playlist, I‚Äôm listening to one artist, but I want to listen to lovejoy, so I skip about 30 minutes WORTH of ad free music and it gives me an add, I just wish that it was actually 30 minutes and not skipping (if that makes sense) and my second problem is if you‚Äôre offline, but you‚Äôre on a track trying to get to a song you like (as in you search it up) and you‚Äôre on a song you hate and you turn off your device, then you go offline then you‚Äôre just stuck on that song until your internet is fixed (I have an 8 hour long playlist so during that time I really wanted to listen to other music)

title: Like it but it has too many ads without premium
text: Sometimes I‚Äôll be listening to music and after a song it gives me 3 15 second ads in a row and it really aggrivates me because if I want to play a different track, even though I already had to listen to 3 ads it still gives me three more. The only other problem I have is when it shows the songs in a playlist or album that‚Äôs not mine it only shows a few of the songs. If I want to know if a certain song is on a playlist I won‚Äôt have any way of knowing unless I listen to the entire thing and waste an hour of my time. Also sometimes while I‚Äôm listening to music a song will randomly stop and when I turn on my phone It says there‚Äôs no music being played. I got into the app and play the music again and it starts the song over for it to just stop in the middle again. I‚Äôm hoping this bug gets fixed soon because it really gets on my nerves.

title: Love app but just a few tweaks
text:
I love the app! Last night I was listening to my songs on my library, I went to the queue to remove some songs I didn‚Äôt want to play next. It worked for a few but then as I removed more, they wouldn‚Äôt be removed of the list. I had to exit the app move around within the app and then try it again. Sometimes it worked, sometimes it didn‚Äôt. Please fix! 

Suggestion as well, I have so many songs in my personal library and every month or so my ‚Äúfavorite songs‚Äù frequently change. I wish we could ‚Äúfavorite songs‚Äù (maybe add a star or a heart for selection) and they would automatically be placed into a playlist. I know we can create playlists, I tried but it‚Äôs a hassle adding songs to playlists, that way I can easily enjoy which songs I listen to non-stop by just easily heart-ing or star-ring a song.

title: Can't live without it!
text:
If you are a music lover, you NEED this app. With the free version, you can find any song or album and add it to playlists. Oh, and no ads. The downside is that it uses data, and you can not choose the order it plays in. Still a great free app. I highly recommend the paid version. For $10 per month, you can save albums to your phone so you're not using data. You can play albums straight through, in order. You can also download podcasts, and videos, but I don't use those features. It's very intuitive and easy to use. I believe it offers new users the option to try it for 99 cents for 90 days. Do it!! I'm usually a cheapwad when it comes to apps, but this one is worth every penny!

Update: I updated from 5 to 4 stars because of some annoying glitches recently, and only because it prompted me for a rating. When the glitches are fixed I‚Äôll go back to 5. Still highly recommend.

title: Lots of bugs
text: I overall enjoy the layout of the app, but there are a lot of glitches that make the app borderline unusable. Firstly the queue system does not work. When reordering songs in the queue by dragging, they will flicker and the page refuses to scroll, making it very hard to reorder them. Sometimes the app even crashes when I try to do this. Also, the shuffle system is extremely flawed, as often times in a playlist songs by the same artist will play one after another, or conversely songs organized chronologically in a playlist will shuffle slightly but will gradually advance in time. For example, I have a chronological playlist by a single artist and the songs will usually shuffle by playing the oldest songs first and then gradually getting to the new ones, while still shuffling slightly between the songs. Please fix these issues as they take away from the music listening experience.

title: The app might as well be completely broken.
text: There are an overwhelming number of negatives to positives with this app, it feels completely broken at best. I can listen to the songs I have saved hardly a fraction of the time, because otherwise the app completely floods me with suggested songs, and most of which have absolutely nothing in common with my saved songs. If I‚Äôm really lucky, I get about ten suggested songs for every two songs I have saved that the app lets me listen to. Most of the time though, it won‚Äôt even play a single song I have saved to any playlist, or even if I‚Äôm trying to directly listen to an album, or from an artist. If I mark certain songs not to be played, the app still plays them anyway, making that feature absolutely worthless. The ads, for some reason, are at least twice as loud as the songs. The menus feel clunky and inconvenient at best. The ‚Äúdon‚Äôt play this song‚Äù feature doesn‚Äôt work, the songs are still there and it still plays them regardless. This app is barely functioning, and it keeps getting worse with each update.

title: Incredible! But‚Ä¶
text:
I love this app! It has many great features!
1. The playlists to share around with other people! You can them as long as you want with any songs you please.
2. All the different song choices is great as well, I can find almost every song I want. Sadly it fed the have some which is okay as well!
3. You can make these ‚Äústory‚Äôs‚Äù and make them about anything you want. Which I think is really cool though I don‚Äôt Listen to them anymore.
4. How you can add your own pictures to your playlists, you can sometimes edits other playlists that people made, you can block songs if you don‚Äôt like them ( this choice is mostly for parents in my opinion.) you also can leave like on other playlists.
For the problem‚Ä¶
There are many ads. I know you want the money so you put in several ads so people will buy the premium but to be honest, not many people are going to want to especially sense some people come on here to escape the pay for other music apps. I am mostly okay with it but it also plays two 30 second ads which in my opinion is annoying, especially when you are taking a bath and just want to listen to some nice music.
I would recommend this app, but unless you don‚Äôt want to pay for a subscription, prepare for the ads.

title: Keeps updating against the grain
text: For a music app‚Äîthe usability of this app has actually become worse and a hindrance to the enjoyment of music. First it was the degradation of suggestions, then the inseparability of key features actually made worse by AI, and now ON A MUSIC app, it is impossible to add a song more than once to a playlist‚Äîwhich you have to do to circumvent horrible priority centered algorithms. Its also harder to use the app without being in the app‚Äîwhich is often needed for music. Paying for premium only removes audio ads not the constant bombardment on what was once a good home page. The radios are not tailored to the artists, songs, or albums, but what you've been listening to recently as if you didn‚Äôt click on the radio to change that very thing! Discovering smaller artists is more impossible than ever and after all these years you can only look at an individual album at a time‚Äînot the individual songs in a discography. Everybody should use bandcamp and lie in wait for this app to go from daily use to hard to use to a nuisance.

title: Isaiah Robertson on Why Black Church History Holds Many Answers for White Western Christians
text:
This Podcast featuring Isaiah Robertson was an ‚Äú. eye opener.‚Äù

Isaiah was very knowledgeable about not only the Black Church, but he admitted that he at one time was a Reformed Theologist, rallying against the black church;   until he did his homework and followed the recommendation of a friend and read and researched the historical black churches for himself.  Pastor Isaiah immersed himself in those environments, and literature, and admittedly learned the value of the black culture, church, in relation to Christianity.
Therefore, Isaiah Robertson, encourages Western  Christians to read black seminary literature, visit black churches to ‚Äúallow the evidence to speak for itself.‚Äù  Then, the  Western Christians will be able to see first hand, why, ‚ÄúBarnes Research,‚Äù  validates that Christianity is flourishing at a higher more resilient rate in the Black Churches as compared to the Western Christianity Churches.

title: Shuffle should probably get removed
text:
I can‚Äôt turn shuffle off, I make a playlist so I can listen to a song on loop, and it just adds random son to my playlist, shuffle can‚Äôt be turned off, I did everything and it‚Äôs so annoying. I can‚Äôt listen to ONE song in peace without the shuffle mixing everything up. There are too many disadvantages of not being a premium, honestly, I would join premium but,  I‚Äôm not going to spend money just to listen to music. I absolutely hate the fact I can‚Äôt remove the songs added by the app and turn on loop for one song, sometimes I want to listen to one song out of a playlist and it just plays a random song, it‚Äôs confusing and annoying, please fix it? Overall I guess it‚Äôs a good app with issues that are pretty minor, but this is getting annoying for me. 
As stated, I have tried turning it off but it‚Äôs practically impossible, I can‚Äôt find anything to turn it off. So my playlists are just random songs I never added. 
Please fix the issue??

title: Almost good
text: The app is amazing but i really hate the ads,how long they are and how many you have to listen to till you finally get to listen to your music again. I also really hate how if i dislike a ad you keep on playing it over and over again like your trying to get a bad rating. I would be having like a mental breakdown and be playing music and then an ad would be like ‚ÄúcOmE tO wEsTcHeStEr uNivErSiTy aNd PuT yOuR cArEeR On pAuSe‚Äù and it would kill the mood and then I would feel like shooting my head off. I just want to listen to my music ad free and i know theres a premium but why-? Like no one wants to PAY monthly just for ad free music, what im saying is please calm down how many ads you play and listen to the ratings that people give them. Im not done tho, i have a constant feeling that I should be able to CHOOSE what ads i HAVE to listen to. Thank you for reading this if you do.<3

title: I hate it!
text: What did you guys do? My iPad app was fine until you did your updated day ago. Now I have lost access to all 8000+ songs. First you had to go and change how the phone app works and now you change how the iPad app works. I have never been a premium user and don‚Äôt want to be one. I have been able to use this app with the free account for the past few years and have really enjoyed it. Now, I‚Äôm going to have to say goodbye because of your update. I don‚Äôt want to listen to individual songs nor do I want to listen to my music through a radio station or playlist. I want to be able to access all my songs and shuffle them like I used to. Just because you get money from your premium members doesn‚Äôt mean you need to make it miserable for your free members. This app used to be the number one place I went to for my music, but I can‚Äôt do that now. Here‚Äôs a tip, if it isn‚Äôt broken, don‚Äôt fix it! Also, please tell people what they‚Äôre getting with each update. Had I known that you were going to completely change the iPad app, I wouldn‚Äôt have updated it in the first place.

title: Review
text: I terribly miss the feature where you can organize your playlist by artist, by song, and by album. Currently, on my playlists, it can be only be organized by you which is by when I added them, however I don't want some of my playlists to be organized like that. Also, I haven‚Äôt added a song to my playlists in a long while, partially because of how my playlists are automatically organized, because I can‚Äôt even listen an individual song before I add it to my playlists. I didn‚Äôt mind only listening to a part of a song like a long before, but not at all just frustrates me. Often I wish there was an un-update button for your app because sometimes there are some things you shouldn‚Äôt like update. I don‚Äôt even know if premium will get me back these features. I‚Äôve looked into it, it just doesn‚Äôt say that it will. If it did then I would make the switch to premium, but it doesn‚Äôt.

title: I love it!!!
text: This app has ALL of my favorite music and it‚Äôs easy enough to navigate. I‚Äôve used both the free version and premium and I‚Äôve been using it since 2016 and it has never failed me. I will make a suggestion though, I know you guys have the whole watch this commercial for thirty minutes of music and I love that but it would be awesome if some of the commercials rewarded us with one free skip ever now and then. I make this suggestion because when you use the free version you have 6 skips and if you only want to hear one song by whoever off whatever album those skips go pretty quick since you can‚Äôt just pick the song you want unless you pay and not everyone is willing or able to do that plus the commercials are repetitive and that can be annoying to no end so maybe reward us for our patience üòä I really do love this app though.

title: Intentionally bad experience for free users
text:
I can‚Äôt see a way to preview songs. Also it‚Äôs ridiculous that you can‚Äôt just select a song a listen to it without paying, and that random songs that you probably don‚Äôt like are added to playlists with no way to remove them.  I feel like being able to listen offline, with no ads, and unlimited skips would be plenty for a premium membership, but to make it so the experience is completely miserable unless you pay just stinks. 

Also fairly frequently when listening to my playlist of liked songs the app seems to just decide it‚Äôs no longer going to play anything at all that I‚Äôve actually selected and just starts playing song after song after song of random junk that I have no interest in. It‚Äôs not even like they just threw an unwanted few songs into my playlist, it‚Äôs like it‚Äôs just completely ignoring the playlist altogether. I then have to force quit and relaunch the app to fix it. Very annoying.

title: New UI is not great.
text: I loved the app before the new UI interface, but now you don‚Äôt have the option to look fo specific songs in your library. You‚Äôre given three options: playlists, artists, or albums. There is no way to play the already downloaded music without being forced to go to the specific album which when you tap the song will continue to play the rest of the album even if you don‚Äôt want to listen to it. Just add back the tab for the music that is already on your device like previous updates. Without that option, there is literally no point in having a premium membership as there is no easy way to access your music at all. There is a playlists of your liked songs, but that is no where as easy as it used to be. This is a serious UI problem that needs to be addressed quickly.

title: this one problem is bugging me
text: this is overall a very good app, i millions of songs you can play non-stop and you can create many playlists without any problems. it all started today, Jan 13th 2023, the songs i tried to play it just stops at 9 seconds no matter what song it is or playlist it just keeps stopping and i try to restart my phone because i thought that was the problem but it wasn‚Äôt. i tried doing a lot of things to get it to work but it didn‚Äôt do anything. so then i went onto the app store and saw it needed an update, i updated it and it was working but then after i went onto a new song it continues to stop but now at 11 seconds and idk how to work this but overall it‚Äôs a amazing but it‚Äôs just this one problem that keeps bugging me. so i‚Äôd rate it a 4.8/5. thanks for reading<333

title: Great service, but new interface is garbage and search is worse
text:
Another app that provides a fantastic service but thinks ‚Äúinnovation‚Äù is creating another echo chamber that feels like social media. I don‚Äôt need you to bastardize my browsing experience by reminding me of my personal playlists I just listened to. I know what playlists I have, because I made them and I listen to them. And, there‚Äôs already a tab for it in my library, right there!

I go to ‚Äúbrowse‚Äù for OTHER playlists and see what else is popular in the world, beyond my bubble. The ‚Äútailored‚Äù playlists aren‚Äôt ‚Äúinnovation‚Äù, it‚Äôs just another echo chamber. 

Also, y‚Äôall clearly take a ton of analytics on the music I listen to... but I can‚Äôt have a play count on my playlists, or see any of my usage like iTunes allows? I don‚Äôt need to be offered a ‚Äútailored‚Äù playlist that‚Äôs 95% songs I already have in a personal playlist, but it‚Äôd be nice for me to be able to actually reflect on what I listen to and how often - beyond the terrible ‚Äúyear in review‚Äù playlists that get pushed out every December.

title: Annoyed
text: When I first had this app it‚Äôs was great I could look up what ever song and wanted and play it right then and there but the app changed and I can‚Äôt play the song I want when I want I have to shuffle through the playlist and if I don‚Äôt like a song in the playlist and try to hit shuffle again it won‚Äôt change the song so I have to listen to stuff I don‚Äôt want to. Also when you go to your personal playlist you have to shuffle instead of chose the song you want to listen to even though it‚Äôs your own playlist and it should let you click on a song and listen to it. The extra songs in your playlist are also annoying because I just want to listen to the songs I chose and not something so coming back to the shuffle issue when it shuffles to the extra songs area I can‚Äôt change to song even if I press shuffle again and end up listening to music I‚Äôve never heard or like. Sorry for being so negative but this has been bothering me for a while and I considering getting rid of the app.

title: Almost perfect
text: I‚Äôd give it 5 stars but I‚Äôm gonna give it 4 stars. The main  reason I don‚Äôt give it 5 stars is because I when you add a song to the playlist it gets added to the bottom so I have to drag it from the bottom to the top. Idk why a app that I pay for doesn‚Äôt allow people to have the option to automatically add a song to either the top or bottom. Since I‚Äôm already complaining their is a small issue with where it frequently won‚Äôt let me add a song to a playlist which I could understand if you refreshed the app and it let you but I‚Äôve tried that many times to no avail. This leads to me liking a song while driving (because it‚Äôs easier than adding it while driving) and then a couple of songs I forget about which isn‚Äôt really a big deal at all it‚Äôs just a inconvenience that I would imagine they would of fixed by now.

title: Five Stars!
text:
As a music lover I found in this app the music I never thought I could be able to find in any other app and taste it before buy it. Great quality audio and my favorites musicians are here all of them. I love this app so much! I have my favorites albums all in one app I can hear music all day without buy it... it's just awesome! I have the free option and the way this guys managing ads is great... Thanks for the hard work! Keep it up. All that above was set it up by the app itself, but they read my mind that‚Äôs what I think about this great app, I have found music on here that I never ever thought I‚Äôll be able to find with a great audio quality, music that my great, great grandpa told me that his grandpa used heard it in his younger days. Anyway, download it, you won‚Äôt regret.

NOTE: this is my OWN opinion about this app. Thank you.

title: Shuffle mode
text: I wouldn‚Äôt fives the app 5 stars if this weird update didn‚Äôt happen. Before when I got the app I was able to listen to the music I wanted by clicking on the song. But now when I try and do that it starts shuffling music from other genres instead of the one I clicked. I can‚Äôt seem to turn off shuffle mode either, which is weird because I never turned it on in the first place. You should really fix that part of the app because if I click on a song to listen to I expect that song to play, not some other song that also fits its genre. Everything else about the app is fine, just please fix this one thing‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs very frustrating for someone like me having music be something to clan me down. It was easier to listen to it on this app before that shuffle thing happened.

title: Not too bad, but‚Ä¶
text: This app would be great if only it didn‚Äôt shove the recommended songs in my face. I don‚Äôt have Premium and I don‚Äôt plan on getting it mainly because it works so much better on my computer. I can‚Äôt listen to a specific song on the app because I have to sort through like 5 or more seemingly random songs to finally play what I originally wanted, and the fact that there are only 6 skips an hour makes it harder. I‚Äôm fine with shuffle being always on for non-Premium users as long as it would stop playing suggested songs before and after the song I wanted (although not being able to loop a song really bugs me sometimes) Other than that, I don‚Äôt mind the ads too much except there are like 3 thirty second ads sometimes?? Overall I would definitely give this a higher rating if it was at least a bit more like the desktop version. Not a bad app, just needs some improvements

title: I love this app!
text:
Look this app is great and all knowing you can listen to anything with your phone off and all but i wish you could add like a previous track button i don't want to listen to another 69 tracks just to go back to that song.
Also 6 skips per hour?! To me that doesn't make sense to me why 6 why such a little number at least make it 12 or 10 just why 6 
Something else is that please stop adding songs to my track i don't want your recommended songs i know which songs i want bot only that but come on You Cant Even Remove it!!!! I don't want to listen to your recommended songs trust me i know what i want to listen to.
And put a little less frequent ads not only that but come on your putting like 50 ads every time that really annoys me make it 2 instead of 5,000.
Thank you.

title: Why I‚Äôm deleting
text: I made a playlist of 20 songs me and my children like and started playing it, 3 songs in a song that wasn‚Äôt in my playlist started screaming aggressive racial slurs and other curse words that my children( 5 and 7 ) definitely don‚Äôt need to hear. As fast as I could I lowered the volume but by that point the damage had been done my young innocent children heard some of the worst words imagineable. So I try and see what‚Äôs going on while my husband is driving. I instantly try to skip the song but it doesn‚Äôt, I try again a few more times and it won‚Äôt change. I removed it from my playlist and it was still playing after I restarted the app and restarted my phone. I will be talking to my lawyer and we‚Äôre goin to get this crap figured out. This app has no excuses to expose my children to explicit content unannounced. I will be uninstalling the app.

title: ads, skips, and adding unwanted music
text: This is an ok app. I like the layout but there are A LOT of downsides. There are always ads like every two songs. It absolutely ruins the mood and vibe. And when one of those "wanna break from the ads" pops up i click it and it says that i have 30 minutes of ad free music but then around 3 songs later it plays another ad. i should get around 10 songs before another ad. also the fact that i can skip and go back on whatever i want on my xbox but i cant do the same thing on my iphone is ridiculous. i didn't have to pay on my xbox so why can't i have the same privileges on my iphone. also when i make MY playlist it adds unwanted music when i shuffle it because apparently the playlist wasn't long enough. it's my playlist and i shouldn't have to listen to music i didn't add. and don't even tell me to get premium because i'm not paying 10 dollars a month for it. it doesn't seem worth it. i would just rather use another app.

title: Pretty dang good, but a few fixes could make it SO much better.
text:
The app is typically pretty spot-on with recommendations, but I am now getting tons of ‚Äúsongs‚Äù that are really just nature sounds because I have a short sleep playlist I shuffle at night. This has also happened when I play someone else‚Äôs music for them often, like my sibling‚Äôs playlist for the car. 

I listen to TONS of other music and still, my recommendations are filled with something I just set on quiet in the background. More people will probably relate to playing others‚Äô playlists and getting recommended things way out of their taste. I used to get lots of new songs and look forward to discover weekly. 

There are two ways to go about this that I could think of. Being able to mark certain playlists as not for use in recommendations or to start a session where nothing you play is taken into account for recommendations.

title: Good selection of songs, but WAY to many commercials
text:
As far as Music selection and quality of sound goes its a great app. Yet if you can‚Äôt afford to get the paid version basically every 5 songs you get to listen to 1.5 mins of commercials! Every once in a while the will offer you to watch a commercial and not have adds for 30mins. I wish they offered it more often, because sometimes in a 30min span (if you are unlucky an don‚Äôt get an offer you watch a video) you will have listened to 9 commercials! Then I swear every time you change your play list they restart all commercials. For example l watch a video in exchange for 30 mins of no adds, but I decided a few mins after doing this to switch playlist. When I did, I got commercials again and it had only been 10 mins :/
Asides from the adds though, it is a great app, so if you can afford the monthly version I would recommend it otherwise many pandora is better for free listening.

title: Great, but has some flaws.
text: The app is great, but if you expect it to be anything like the desktop version, you‚Äôre wrong. The app doesn‚Äôt allow you to listen to one specific song, and makes a playlist around it so you‚Äôre unable to listen to it until you get through the other songs. Unless you want to use your 6 skips an hour, than sure. It also adds songs to playlists you make in order to again, stop you from listening to the actual song. The only way to get around this? Pay a monthly subscription of $9.99. To listen to a specific song. And get unlimited skips. At that point it‚Äôs not even worth using the app. And you also have to go onto their website in order to even get premium. You can‚Äôt get it through the app. You also can‚Äôt listen to one playlist in order. Because the non-shuffle feature is also a part of premium. It‚Äôs really annoying too. But mind you, you are getting free music. Just not the way you want it.

title: bad updates
text: I am still extremely annoyed that the ‚Äúrecently played‚Äù page has gone away and been changed to a much more confusing layout. The fact you can‚Äôt even see all artists under the ‚Äúartists‚Äù tab unless you‚Äôve downloaded all their music is just stupid. Also downloaded songs are apparently no longer ‚Äúliked‚Äù automatically, so there‚Äôs no way to play all downloaded songs unless you manually ‚Äúlike‚Äù every single download. Also I‚Äôm not sure if this is a bug, but songs don‚Äôt start to play unless you click on them twice now, which is pointless. All the recent changes are bad, please go back to how things were before, ESPECIALLY the ‚Äúrecently played‚Äù section that showed artists/playlists/songs/albums/radio stations, etc. and gave you the option to edit and remove them from the page. Or at least add a ‚Äúsongs‚Äù section instead of just playlists, artists (which doesn't even show all your artists, so what‚Äôs the point?) and albums. Navigating the app as it is now is so much more confusing, tedious, and time consuming than it used to be.

title: Annoying Bugs, So-so Navigation
text: Overall, this app is quite good. I like the flexibility and general ease-of-use. But there are some bugs that hamper the experience. The most annoying one is while using the search feature the back navigation buttons can disappear. It‚Äôs then impossible to go back and do another search. The app will eventually reset and make search available again but only if you force quit the app (which doesn‚Äôt always work) or wait a while until iOS restarts the app on its own. This is a major bug and I hope they fix soon. Another problem is that long titles get cut off in most screens and there‚Äôs really no way to see them. They definitely need to fix that. Also, I‚Äôm very glad they included an EQ. They didn‚Äôt have to do that; major props for doing so. But I do wish you could save custom settings and you didn‚Äôt have to dive so deep into the menus to get to it. Otherwise the app is OK but there is still much room for improvement.

title: Great App With Room for Improvement
text:
So, I love this app. I‚Äôm a college student and I love how premium is only $4.99/month. However, there are some things I wish yall would improve about this app:
1. When we are listening to a playlist and do a search to add something to the queue, as soon as we add the song it closes the search. If I want to add multiple songs by one artist I have to do the search again and again. Just keep the search up until we are done adding to the queue and let us close it. I don‚Äôt think that would be hard to add.
2. After adding a song to the queue and the playlist moves on to the next song, if we go back to listen again it goes to the song that came on before the song added to the queue. Just keep it in the queue, sometimes I want to listen to a song multiple times.
Overall this is a great app but those two things are just irritating in my opinion.

title: The ‚Äúlike‚Äù button isn‚Äôt there anymore
text:
Why did y‚Äôall got rid of the like button? 
  It was so helpful, I was able to see which songs I liked from an album, which songs I already knew from a playlist, etc (thanks to the heart showing next to the name of the song). Now I can‚Äôt differentiate at first glance what song I already know/like, from a song that I haven‚Äôt heard yet. 
  Please get it back, I don‚Äôt know if I already liked a song, to know I have to open the library of playlist and see if it is added to my ‚Äúliked playlist‚Äù. I do like the fact that I can add one song to multiple playlist at the same time and don‚Äôt have to open the playlist menu multiple times when I want to add just one song to more than one playlist, but I bet there‚Äôs a way to have that feature and also the ‚Äúlike‚Äù button to show next to the song name.

title: Good app but not for me (mobile user)
text: I‚Äôve loved this app so much I love all of it i like the songs lyrics and more! But one thing I absolutely dispise as a mobile user is that I can‚Äôt get more than 6 skips if I want that I need premium another issue is that this dumb app puts random songs that aren‚Äôt in my play list but are similar but if I wanted to use those songs I would put them you should be able to chose whether or not if you have recommended songs because sometimes I want to listen to my play list and it puts songs that I don‚Äôt like so in my opinion great app except for mobile users so if you have a school laptop get it there beacause you have unlimited skips and  don‚Äôt have recommended songs so to make this better you should be able to skip every 30 minutes and make it from 6 to 10 skips and the shuffle feature is fine by me.

title: Incredibly frustrating for free users
text:
Look I understand that if you‚Äôre using it for free, you won‚Äôt get as many features as when you‚Äôre paying for money.
But there are some features that literally shouldn‚Äôt have to be in the premium. 
Downloading and no ads and only 6 skips , reasonable.
But the ability to not be able to pick one song or to put it on repeat? Seriously?
Like I will hear about a song, or an artist has released a new song. I go search it, press play and it‚Äôs starts playing a random song that I don‚Äôt want to listen to? Like are you kidding me? Or listening to a playlist and after it‚Äôs finished it starts playing random songs I don‚Äôt want to listen to. Or maybe liking a song and just not having the feature to go back, it‚Äôs so frustrating and has made me want to delete the app on multiple occasions. 
And the library thing, why are you putting artists that I follow in my library and playlists together, I have to press the filter button which goes away right as I exit the app, it‚Äôs so annoying and cluttered, and as a perfectionist and somebody who has to have everything organized, it‚Äôs makes me want to scream. Like make a button just for the artists or something, it‚Äôs rlly annoying. 
I really hope you fix these problems, there are some nice things about this app, but the problems just ruin the whole experience. :/

title: I...just..can‚Äôt anymore...
text: This app was the best thing ever at one point. From ability to find my favorite music, stocked library of artists, to the ORIGINAL ‚Äúradio‚Äù feature that was more random (new music) like Pandora and not a limited playlist like it is now. However, now the ‚Äúartist radio‚Äù feature is useless to discover anything new, and worst of all the ‚Äúdaily playlists‚Äù and ‚Äúdiscover weekly‚Äù are HORRENDOUS!! I listen to one song maybe twice and it‚Äôs suddenly EVERYWHERE. It would be amazing if I could reset both search history and listening history. Resetting back to one would allow for new discoveries in music. It feels like a music bubble. This app is fast becoming not worth the premium price tag. Pandora isn‚Äôt it...but at half the price and given I‚Äôve discovered more amazing new music and come to this app to add it to a playlist, maybe I should make Pandora my primary app. My thoughts. But....seriously....the idea I listen to a song twice or someone I let pick a song on a drive home and it‚Äôs now one of my ‚Äúon repeat‚Äù songs??? HORRIBLE.

title: Great for computers horrible for phones.
text: This app is incapable of using shuffle mode. It‚Äôs good for listening to music, which is why I‚Äôm giving 3 stars because it does what it says it supposed to do. But the ads are making me furious. I get you can get premium to get rid of ads and skip. But I don‚Äôt mind listening to ads and I don‚Äôt care about skipping songs. So to me it seems like a waste of money. But when I‚Äôm with my family listening to music, I DO NOT want to hear ads about CONDOMS and PERIOD PADS. It‚Äôs inappropriate for some of the members of my family. And I‚Äôm tired of hearing them. I‚Äôm a female. I get periods are a regular thing. Nothing against periods. But I don‚Äôt believe my 8 year old brother needs to hear about periods and condoms. Both are very important I feel. But not so much you have to play the ad after every 2-3 songs. It‚Äôs irritating, it‚Äôs embarrassing, and reporting them does absolutely nothing. There is no explicit filter for ads. I almost just want to stop using it. It‚Äôs so irritating.

title: I miss you
text: I honestly don‚Äôt write reviews on shows much but the absence of Mario and Jethrow and the continued mystery and real life drama that is Lee is what intrigues me about this podcast. Sure I have an opinion that USUALLY ends up pretty square between Mario and jethrow I honestly and completely understand that this podcast doesn‚Äôt pay the bills and they can‚Äôt spend the time on it they‚Äôd like but if they read this keep going guys we love yin and need you and are here when you‚Äôre back. As to the new found listeners go back and binge from the the beginning and truly appreciate and understand this journey that‚Äôs what I did. When they come back from their unannounced hiatus and they announce season two they should have plenty (10-20) episodes recorded and be ready to give it up . Love you guys big ups and thanks again üí•üòâüëäüèæ

title: I LOVE this platform but this glitch driving me crazy
text: So I‚Äôve used this for 2-3 years but within the last two weeks I‚Äôll be listening to music then  try to skip a song (btw I‚Äôm in a family plan) maybe a couple but then I skip one to many times and I can‚Äôt rewind, pause skip change or anything I will literally close the app and it just keeps playing! So then I go back into the app and it sends me back like a bunch of songs, maybe bc I have 501 songs in my liked playlist or something but WHAT THE HECK???!! It was more spread out before but now it‚Äôs like only 1 skip and it glitches, if I finish it, it‚Äôll just go quiet until I close it out and try again! I‚Äôm so angry with this app right now! I‚Äôm caught up in EVERY update too. Like what? I‚Äôve thrown my phone from my dresser (other side of room) to my bed 4 times today just bc of it happening multi times in a row!

title: Pretty cheap, greedy and Money hungry for a massive company üòí
text:
Ok so be me:
Just got a phone a month ago realizes, I CAN PLAY MY FAVORITE ARTISTS AND SONGS NOW!! But then ya know just listening to music for the past week on the bus ride to school but then I wake up. Can‚Äôt see my any my songs in my playlist now, can‚Äôt even choose which one I want play now. Because it‚Äôs not letting me see but THENNNNNNMM they even start putting songs in playlist randomly, and then it‚Äôs gets even worse I can only skip a song 6 times an hour so now I actually can‚Äôt listen to my real playlist at all anymore and because of the skip thing I just have to hope that maybe just maybe I‚Äôll the at least one of my songs because, oh, wait a minute now they put more songs in then what I put in. And on top of all that u can‚Äôt put a song on loop any more without peREEmeeUMMM U CANT DO ANY THING WITH OUT PREMIUM AND ALL GET NOW IS ADS ADS ADS ADS AND EVEN WHEN THEY SAY ‚ÄúNow, enjoy 30 min of no ads‚Äù AND THEN IT WILL STILL GIVE U POP UP ADS THAT U HAVE TO DISMISS AND THEY PAUSE MY SONG TOO IDK WHAT THEY OR WHAT I DID BUT WHATEVER IT WAS, WAS STUPID

title: üôÇ
text: I‚Äôve been using the App for years and i use it almost everyday, definitely enjoy it, I‚Äôm very open with my music and listen to almost everything that is there to offer. the only thing that would be cool to update a little is how frequently the same songs play when I listen to my play lists. And by that I mean I have alot of songs together or even just all my liked songs and it happens to be choosing the same songs every time. If there was a way to make sure it chooses a different song every time I click the shuffle it would be amazing. For example I have around 2k songs that I‚Äôve liked and it‚Äôs not every single song I know, but even from that it happens to play the same ones I‚Äôve heard before repeatedly while other songs that I have there aren‚Äôt played. That would just be great to do but other than that. Great app!!

title: Downloads and podcast binging
text:
This music service is great! I love the playlists, availability of my favorite artists, and listening across multiple platforms. The app falls short currently in three places for me. Where I live is rural - No cell service, bad wifi. I keep some music and a few episodes of podcasts downloaded so I can listen between home and the glorious land of data, but one of the more recent updates makes downloads not register sometimes. It spins and says I have no internet connection and never shows my downloads. Force quitting the app works 70% of the time, but normally I will have made it to cell service by the time it comes back. 

When trying to binge my favorite podcasts from the beginning to catch up to real time, the app trys to always throw me to the newest one (or episode 0). When trying to go from phone to windows client, listen history is so messed up that I have to use the play progression bars to figure out which one I'm actually on.

title: Its kinda stupid now after the free trial
text: So they gave me a 14 day free trial and I did not know that but when it ran out I was like oh ok I‚Äôm still able to click on a song and listen to it no problem. Well, no. Cuz once the free trial ran out to listen to the full song, the playlist would be on shuffle and you would have to wait till the song came on. And when you clicked on the song, it would play like 6 seconds of it and then would stop playing that. Also once the free trial ran out you got to skip 6 songs per hour. And the app says well you can just upgrade to premium and so you are like alright I‚Äôll get premium and then be able to click on a song and listen to it right there and then. No. It legit says that it does not support premium on the app. I‚Äôm my opinion if it can‚Äôt support it then why put all these premium features? Why not just make it where those are already built in and you don‚Äôt have to worry about it but no. Anyways that‚Äôs my review. I hope y‚Äôall see this and edit y‚Äôall‚Äôs app cuz right now, it‚Äôs trash

title: Multiple Issues
text: This app has a few quality features that make it very nice but a few issues with some basic functions that I just can not over look. To start with pros it should be noted that many many people use this app so there are many songs put out by people that you can not find on other music apps. Plus you can find many varieties of playlists which is great! The cons that I can not ignore is how poorly I have found the workings of their playlist functions to be. I can not add new playlists on my phone or laptop nor can I delete or edit them. It says I have deleted something but it never goes away. So it is very irritating in that way which could be ignored if it were not such a basic feature. The other issue is I have tried reaching out about the issue but have found myself waiting for a response for quite some time. All in all it is a fine app but due to its failures with playlists I‚Äôll have to opt for Apple Music instead.

title: Apart from numerous glitches/bugs, still the app that I‚Äôd pick
text:
I‚Äôd give you 5 stars if there went so many glitches. I do like the app, I use it nearly everyday, but the bugs on here make it annoying to use. 

#1 problem: The app will sometimes refresh randomly while I‚Äôm using it. My music stops and when I open the app, my playlist has stopped. It either closes the playlist completely, or pauses it, which gets frustrating.

#2 problem: I added a song to my queue once and then my app did the refresh thing, and now there‚Äôs an empty space between the song currently playing and the ‚ÄúNext From: [playlist name]‚Äù and it won‚Äôt go away. Now the top bar and stuff on the app are always pushed up. (I have the iPhone 13 and it goes under my camera bar) I tried everything apart from uninstalling the app. It‚Äôs not really a big problem, but it‚Äôs annoying to me.

#3 problem: Sometimes my app does this glitch with the lyrics when I go into the app after entering another app. When it goes to another song, it‚Äôll have the lyrics from the other song still there, unmoving. It‚Äôll have the lyrics from one song stuck in the lyrics box until I close the app out. I notice the scroll for my playlist name also stops when this happens. 

I can‚Äôt think of anything else, so that‚Äôs about it.

I give the app a 6/10, 3 stars until these glitches are fixed. Since I‚Äôm not a verified artist on Twitter and just some lowly customer, you probably won‚Äôt read this. Please fix your app.

title: This app is truly an embarrassment
text: Slick, intuitive design. That‚Äôs it. Every time I see an update for this app in the App Store I get excited that it‚Äôs myriad issues will finally be resolved and every time I‚Äôm let down. The app is so unstable. When the ads try to come up half the time the app just stops. Or the buttons stop working. Or the song looks like it‚Äôs playing, buy no sound. Or literally ceases functioning. Sometimes I have to reboot my phone to zap it back to life. I‚Äôve had this app for over a year now and it seems more unstable then ever. How can this be? How can a software company with this much money and this much ‚Äòcool‚Äô be so terrible at software design for iPhones. I just don‚Äôt get it. On top of that they want me to pay them monthly to upgrade to premium! No way. I feel bad for their advertisers that are paying them to have their ads not get played b/c the app constantly craps the bed. I only write this b/c I believe these messages can lead to better design. So stop posting 4.8 stars people. Don‚Äôt be so nice or the app won‚Äôt get better.

title: Good app, horrible coding
text: As far as the functionality, I can't complain when the app works; however, it frequently doesn't work. Practically every time I leave the app open and try to come back to it -- even within the refresh rate window -- it freezes and I have to force reset it. But that's not the kicker; the kicker is that the app is too stupid to realize it's closed so it starts playing the music it wouldn't let you play before you tried to shut it down. I am consistently frustrated by how ridiculous this thing is. Practically every major developer we rely on at this point just keeps cramming features in without optimizing anything, and while there's been some effort on Spotify's part to make it serious, it still handles like a crappy little plaything on a toy of an operating system. Oh yeah and I'd like it if I could keep my music forever please? And not have to wait for the New Depression to lose it when this company finally runs out of finance capital?
